title: Spaghetti with prawns, tomato and rocket

ingredients.item: 250g pack essential Waitrose Cherry Tomatoes, halved
250g frozen essential Waitrose Cooked and Peeled Prawns, defrosted

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, then drain and return to the pan.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the tomatoes for 2-3 minutes. Add the prawns and ricotta and heat for 1-2 minutes. Stir into the spaghetti with the rocket.
